verses.text:
When Thou shalt come with Thy bright crown, That glo-rious vic-tor's diadem,
May I be there be-fore Thy throne, And wear a crown that comes from Him.

When Thou shalt come with all Thy saints, That glo-rious com-pa-ny so fair,
May I be num-bered with Thy saints, And of Thy glo-ry have a share.

When Thou shalt come to claim Thy bride, That spot-less, pure, and glo-rious band,
May I be stand-ing by Thy side, And wear a robe made by Thy hand.

chorus.text:
When Thou shalt come, when Thou shalt come,
To take Thy wait-ing church a-way;
When Thou shalt come, when Thou shalt come,
O blessed, blessed, glo-rious day!
